Dockets

Devin Judge-Lord

2024-07-30

get_dockets.Rmd

Get dockets from an agency

  • get_dockets("[agency_acronym]") retrieves dockets for an agency (see official acronyms on regulations.gov)
# you need an API key
source("~/api-key.R")

library(regulationsdotgov)

devtools::load_all() # FIXME This is only here because library() was not loading the functions, possibly due to lack of documentation
# get FBI dockets
FBI_dockets <- get_dockets("FBI")

FBI_dockets[[1]]$data  # FIXME we should not need  [[1]]$data when this no longer returns a list
#>               id    type attributes.docketType attributes.lastModifiedDate attributes.highlightedContent attributes.agencyId
